biography.bio: Hannelore Elsner was born on July 26, 1942 in Burghausen, Germany as Hannelore Elstner. She is an actress, known for Commissaire Lea Sommer (1994), Cherry Blossoms, un rêve japonais (2008) and L'insaisissable (2000). She was previously married to Uwe Carstensen and Gerd Vespermann.
biography.name: Hannelore Elsner

biography.bio: Max Urlacher was born on September 4, 1971. He is an actor, known for Valkyrie (2008), Passion (2012) and The Princess and the Warrior (2000).
biography.name: Max Urlacher

biography.bio: Kai Scheve was born on February 11, 1966 in Steinheidel-Erlabrunn, Germany. He is an actor, known for Freundschaft mit Herz (1995), No Sex (1999) and Ein Dorf sucht seinen Mörder (2002).
biography.name: Kai Scheve

biography.bio: Ursula Karven was born on September 17, 1964 in Ulm, Baden-Württemberg, Germany as Ursula Ganzenmüller. She is an actress and producer, known for Stille Post (2008), Con Express (2002) and Nicht mit mir, Liebling (2012). She was previously married to James Veres.
biography.name: Ursula Karven

biography.bio: Heio von Stetten was born on July 5, 1960 in Aystetten, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor, known for Fed Up! (2005), Bandits (1997) and Das ewige Lied (1997). He has been married to Elisabeth Romano since 1997. They have two children.
biography.name: Heio von Stetten

biography.bio: Julia Richter was born on August 14, 1970 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress and writer, known for Raju (2011), Schwestern (1999) and Freunde fürs Leben (1992).
biography.name: Julia Richter

biography.bio: Anian Zollner was born on February 21, 1969 in Burghausen, Bavaria, Germany. He is an actor and writer, known for War Horse (2011), Les années du mur (1995) and Rohe Ostern (1996).
biography.name: Anian Zollner

biography.bio: Tina Bordihn was born on June 29, 1973 in Düsseldorf, North Rhine-Westphalia, West Germany. She is an actress, known for Une famille en Bavière (1989), Spiel der Spiele (1999) and Gute Zeiten, schlechte Zeiten (1992).
biography.name: Tina Bordihn

biography.bio: Lilin Wong is an actress, known for Sous le signe de l'amour (2008), Love in Lion City (2009) and Tiger Team: The Mountain of the 1000 Dragons (2010).
biography.name: Lilin Wong

biography.bio: Tan Kheng Hua started out in Corporate Marketing after she has graduated with a Bachelor of Science degree from Indiana University at Bloomington. She has never thought about acting in her youth until she went to the United States to get her Univeristy education. While pursuing her studies, Kheng Hua has enrolled herself in a theatrical art course which has given her the first taste of acting.Although her desire to be an actress was very strong, she did not make acting as a career immediately after she has returned to Singapore.Instead she took up a marketing job and act in her spare time. The first stage play this dame perform in was John Bowen's The Waiting Room directed by her cousin Ivan Heng.It would take almost a decade before Kheng Hua became a full time actress.
biography.name: Kheng Hua Tan

biography.bio: Jason Chan was born on December 1, 1971 in Malaysia as Jason Keng-Kwin Chan. He is an actor and writer, known for Candy (2006), Power Rangers Ninja Storm (2003) and Stealth (2005).
biography.name: Jason Chan

biography.bio: Bill Teoh is an actor, known for Cashless (2009), Der letzte Patriarch (2010) and Wanton Mee (2016).
biography.name: Bill Teoh

biography.bio: Irene Rindje was born in 1956 in Ludwigsburg, Baden-Württemberg, Germany. She is known for her work on Toni Erdmann (2016), Quatre minutes (2006) and Barbara (2012).
biography.name: Irene Rindje

biography.bio: Volkert Kraeft was born on August 7, 1941 in Timmendorfer Strand, Schleswig-Holstein, Germany. He is an actor, known for Une famille en Bavière (1989), Frankenberg (1994) and Bratkartoffeln inbegriffen (1967). He has been married to Edeltraut Kraeft since 1987.
biography.name: Volkert Kraeft
